Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Great intersection of Hwy 17 N and South Morgan's Point Road. North of IOP Connector

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Ideal retail location next to Blue Water Convenience store with a drive-thru and and window already in place. The space is improved with a 1,000 gallon grease trap, 4 tons of HVAC, and two HC restrooms. The listing price is $34.00 / SF NNN plus CAM TI charges estimated to be $6.50 / SF.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Ideal retail location next to Blue Water Convenience store directly across from the entrance to Park West.

address.Common.Line1: Carolina Park - Faison Road & Park Ave Blvd

Common.PostalAddresses.Common.Line1: Carolina Park - Faison Road & Park Ave Blvd

Common.ActualAddress.Common.Line1: Carolina Park - Faison Road & Park Ave Blvd

Common.PostalAddresses.Common.Line1: Carolina Park - Faison Road & Park Ave Blvd

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The site is located on a prime corner diagonally across from Costco. Suites available from 2,500 SF up to 28,000 SF with flexible layouts including patio space and free-standing options.

Located on the corner of Faison Road and Park Blvd, this project will provide excellent visibility and exposure to the thousands of vehicles per day traveling through Carolina Park on their way to Oceanside Collegiate, Wando High, Carolina Park Elementary School, Mt. Pleasant Rec fields and the thousands of homes and apartments in the neighborhood.

Site plans shown are conceptual and subject to change.

Final lease rates will vary based on the suite sizes and final site design.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: New Retail/Office development strategically located in Carolina Park.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Just north of Mt. Pleasant Town Center and before the Market at Oakland.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 6,134 SF 2nd generation restaurant for lease. Highway 17 frontage with excellent visibility. The building provides ample parking and is situated on 3.5 Acres. Outdoor seating area can be accomodated.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: In Mt Pleasant near one of the busiest Publix stores in the Charleston MSA.  Home to many retailers.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
1,300 SF ideal for retail, office and medical office users.

Suites:
Unit 1:1,300 SF 
Unit 2:1,300 SF(currently fitted for a salon)
Unit 3:1,300 SF 
Unit 4:2,684 SF(currently set up as an office)

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Ground floor retail space near bustling retail center

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Mount Pleasant South of the IOP Connector

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Queensborough Shopping Center is home to many retailers and restaurants and is anchored by one of the busiest Publix stores in the MSA. Adjacent tenants within the Queensborough Shopping Center include the UPS Store, Angels & Rascals, Hunan Chinese Restaurant, Airavata Vapors CBD, Kids First Swim School and Paisano's Pizza The Game Show, Sally's Beauty Supply.

1,716 SF End-Cap Available. Currently operating as Hair Salon. Former tenant was Subway with Drive Thru Window. Interior space of 2640sf most recently a dry cleaners.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: This is an excellent opportunity in a bustling retail center in Mount Pleasant, SC.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Intersection of Coleman Boulevard and Houston Northcutt Boulevard in Mt. Pleasant.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Busy boutique shopping center with 35 small shops. Tenants include - Baskin Robbins, Pak Mail, Affordables, Phillips Shoes, Copper Penny, Southern Belles, Bacco's Restaurant, La Pizzeria, Smoothie King, Coralberry Cottage, CHD Interiors, Buy the Bunch, Willow Salon, Mode, Merle Norman, Coleman Collection and various apparel and gift shops.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Retail space in busy boutique shopping center with 35 small shops.
